archdesc.scopecontent: Detroit memories is intended for adults and children interested in life in urban America from the turn of the century up to WWII. The viewer will be transported back to early twentieth-century America to discover what it was like to work in a factory, attend school, and have fun with family and friends in the city. The audience will view photographs, film, and animation as they listen to narration from "grandma" and "grandpa", often backed by Detroit music.
